    • Propositions of logos for Cactus

    Here are contributions for a Cactus logo and associated slogan. Thanks to all that have already participated.

    You can vote for your favorite logo by sending a mail on the Cactus mailing list with the subject "Logo vote".

    You can also participate by sending your proposition on the Cactus mailing list with the subject "Logo proposition". The best logo will be displayed as the official Cactus logo in the top right corner of the Cactus web site ...

    Proposition 1 : Classic

    This is the current logo being displayed on the Cactus web site. It was designed by Lyonel Thouvenot from Octo Technology.


    Proposition 2 : Tomahawk

    This is a proposition from Victor Gritsenko .


    Proposition 3 : A happy cactus

    This is a proposition from Harish S K .


    Proposition 4 : Severe testing

    This is a proposition from Victor Gritsenko .


    Proposition 4

    This is a proposition from Alessandro Ceglia .


    Proposition 5

    This is a proposition from Dimenzio Design Works .


    Proposition 6

    This is a proposition from Alessandro Ceglia .


    Proposition 7

    This is a proposition from Alessandro Ceglia .


    Proposition 8

    This is a proposition from Arthur Jasso.


    Proposition 9

    This is a proposition from Outoftheboxweb.



    Ideas for logos

    Here are some ideas for logos that have been proposed. If some of you have the graphical skills to transform them into reality ...

    From Matthieu Gervaus :
    I don't know if you found your logo for Cactus, but http://manila.userland.com/ has a pretty good looking cactus :)

    From Amarnath Nanduri :
    One idea for the cactus logo is to have a cactus with dead (or dying) bugs on its branches... and the cactus giving a mean and triumpant look (at the bugs it has caught).

    From Eduardo M Gamez :
    How about the word Cactus and have the "t" look like a cactus. The letter "t" resembles a cactus....We have lots of them around Arizona...
